#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int trial;
    cin>>trial;
    while(trial--)
    {             
                  int num,l,count=0,z=2;
                  cin>>num;
                  l=num;
                  while(num)
                  {
                            count+=(num%10);
                            num/=10;
                            }
                  while(--count)
                  z*=2;
                  cout<<l*z<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
    }
